name: .DPDOC
summary: Learn about .DPDOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a DPDOC file in MOTU Digital Performer (Windows, Mac). To do so, open Digital Performer and select File → Open from the program's menu bar.
You can use MOTU Digital Performer to convert the audio project a DPDOC file contains to the following formats:
To do so, select File → Export. Then, select your desired export format.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dpdoc file in MOTU Digital Performer
images.caption: DPDOC file open in MOTU Digital Performer
